item.description:
Welcome to the Providence Collective Monday Meetup series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: E&O Tap - on Knight Street (near the Avery) over on the West Side

E&O Tap is a FAVORITE with P-Collective Members! Its a little tough to find (they have a sign that's lit up now) but well worth it. Located in a neighborhood setting, its a small brick building that looks like the windows are boarded up. Just look for the cool sign over the doorway. Considered "a bit divey, but in a cool, hipster kinda way" and a great place to end a night on the West Side, its located in same area as the Avery (okay, you're almost an RI'er if you know where that is - I couldn't resist - LOL!). Be forewarned, they don't serve food, but the bartender has a plethora of menus to pick from for delivery - so its kind of the best of both worlds. So, back by request and popular demand, come over to E&O for some fun and good cheer this Monday night, and let's check it out!

Hope to see you there!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.
item.how_to_find_us: Its a small place - you can't miss us!!! Just in case, I'll be wearing the fuzzy blue scarf (I think its the last appearance for that for awhile - hoping for Spring!)
item.name: Monday Night Meetup - E & O Tap!
